name: Undying Fury
title: Lord of Eroded Primal Fire: Undying Fury
desc: "Trapped perpetually in the final day of its existence by this pitch-black gospel, its boundless fury has consumed all reason. Now, what remains is its unrelenting lust for battle, burning on without end."
in_play_description: When your opponent plays a card whose name was not in the initial deck at the start of this match: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Energy and +1 to the next instance of DMG. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Lord of Eroded Primal Fire at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc:
Fast Action: Equip this to your Lord of Eroded Primal Fire.
When your opponent plays a card whose name was not in the initial deck at the start of this match: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Energy and +1 to the next instance of DMG. (Once per Round)
(You must have Lord of Eroded Primal Fire in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
